item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, October 28, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Japan plunged into political turmoil after voters punish ruling LDP
2. Shanghai cracks down on Halloween costumes
3. Iran’s supreme leader signals measured response to Israel’s attack
4. European stocks hit by ‘Trump effect’ as odds tilt towards Republican win
5. Battle of the billionaires: the mega rich spending to swing the US election
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, October 28, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
